sys_ui_message.key: your sick leave may be submitted on workday without the doctor's note. doctors notes are required when capturing sick leave of more than 2 days or when sick leave is taken on more than 2 occasions in an 8-week period.
sys_ui_message.message: Your sick leave may be submitted on Workday without the Doctor's note. Doctors notes are required when capturing sick leave of more than 2 days or when sick leave is taken on more than 2 occasions in an 8-week period.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: your sick leave may be submitted on workday without the doctor's note. doctors notes are required when capturing sick leave of more than 2 days or when sick leave is taken on more than 2 occasions in an 8-week period.
